weirdness.name: Weirdness
weirdness.description: Controls creative risk level. Moves from Safe to Chaos.

Normal.description: Baseline (50%). Good balance for most initial generations.

High.description: Experimental, unexpected. Use for bridges or genre blends.

style_influence.name: Style Influence
style_influence.description: Controls how strictly the model adheres to the style tags.

Strong.description: Strict adherence. Use when you have a detailed prompt.

audio_influence.name: Audio Influence
audio_influence.description: Only active when uploading audio. Controls how much the upload guides the generation.

Texture.description: Use upload for background ambience or faint inspiration.

Lead.description: Use upload as the main melody, riff, or vocal.
